content: Specification of OFF or ON in CF commands and the CF configuration file will be preserved for compatibility, but a warning message will be issued to indicate that these options are no longer supported, and that DYNDISP=THIN behavior will be used.  Quantum Safe Signature Checking for CFCC utilizes dual signature scheme – Further enhancement to the Quantum- Safe security of the IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ system, Quantum-safe protection now covers additional CPC firmware, specifically CFCC • Both CFCC boot and update processes will be protected • Leverages CRYSTALS-Dilithium, recently standardized by NIST for quantum-safe digital signatures • Transparent to end users Before you begin the migration process, install the compatibility and coexistence PTFs. A planned outage is required when you upgrade the CF or CF LPAR to CFCC Level 25. Upgrades from one CFLEVEL to the next as part of a CPC technology upgrade often cause increases in CF structure sizing requirements, as the coupling
